children.value: It is interesting to think about why the arguments for

children.html: U2\mathcal U2U2
D2\mathcal D2D2

children.value: On the “object level” there is duality: Swapping
and turning the order around is an isomorphism.
This means that it must be the “meta level” which is breaking the duality.

D\mathcal DD

children.value: This order on distributions goes back to (Jones and Plotkin, 1989) for so-called IPOs and was extended to all posets in Worrell 2000. The observation that it is the posetification will appear in (Kurz and Motamed, 2022).
The definition of the posetification (extension from
